summary: This Bash script copies an X Window Dump (xwd.dump) from a virtual framebuffer (Xvfb_screen0) to the current directory, potentially for displaying graphical content. The original code includes comments to set the DISPLAY environment variable and uses xwd to capture the screen contents as an image file.

details.comment: This Bash script copies an X Window Dump (xwd.dump) from a virtual framebuffer (Xvfb_screen0) to the current directory, potentially for displaying graphical content. The original code includes comments to set the DISPLAY environment variable and uses xwd to capture the screen contents as an image file.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
#set DISPLAY=:9
# get it processed.
cp /dev/shm/xvfb/Xvfb_screen0 xwd.dump
#xwd -display 9 -root -out xwd.dump
